channel.title: 伊朗又有大新闻？还没找到中文报道
channel.description: 伊朗又有大新闻？还没找到中文报道

item.title: 伊朗又有大新闻？还没找到中文报道[0-50]
item.description:
伊朗又有大新闻？还没找到中文报道
Summary of events as of 1:45 PM EDT
--Pence cancels campaign event in NH, Conflicting reports of if he was in the air and diverted or he stayed at the WH.
--Putin cancels event and meets with top general and defense minister urgently after submarine incident left 14 dead
--Rumors of an emergency EU security council meeting which was not yet confirmed but a joint statement rebuking Iran was just released by EU top allies.
--Multiple aircraft of interests such as the USAF Foreign Emergency Support Team C-32 which is a rapid terrorism response team flying out from Washington D.C
-Multiple global EAM (Emergency Action Messages) played over global USAF HF radio.
These are all rapidly developing events and the situation is still very fluid on the global stage, updates sure to follow. #trump #putin #pence #eu #iran #russia
item.content:encoded:
革命少女:
伊朗又有大新闻？还没找到中文报道
Summary of events as of 1:45 PM EDT
--Pence cancels campaign event in NH, Conflicting reports of if he was in the air and diverted or he stayed at the WH.
--Putin cancels event and meets with top general and defense minister urgently after submarine incident left 14 dead
--Rumors of an emergency EU security council meeting which was not yet confirmed but a joint statement rebuking Iran was just released by EU top allies.
--Multiple aircraft of interests such as the USAF Foreign Emergency Support Team C-32 which is a rapid terrorism response team flying out from Washington D.C
-Multiple global EAM (Emergency Action Messages) played over global USAF HF radio.
These are all rapidly developing events and the situation is still very fluid on the global stage, updates sure to follow. #trump #putin #pence #eu #iran #russia

航迹云:
第二条是俄罗斯潜艇自己沉了的事儿吧，跟伊朗无关。最后一条有点意思，空军开始洗地了？

半分宅:
起因应该是伊朗前几天公开宣称开始储备核材料。
